column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Smoked Scuds are on the dinner table. The site is cleared and secured. Over.
Alpha to air unit Bravo. We're finished. Request extract. Over.
Team Alpha, this is your pilot. The LZ is in sight. Prepare for a quick fast-rope insert. Bravo out.
This is Bravo.  Copy that, Alpha. On our way. Give 'em a 'Mad Minute for us as we arrive. Out."
Alpha One, your taxi is overhead. Get your men ready to embark. Over.
Liftoff. Yee haw, we're going home. Bravo out.
Acknowledged, Alpha. Stay away from the smoke clouds, they could contain nerve gas or anthrax. Sweep the area prior to calling for extract.
Nice work, Alpha team. Welcome back. Your mission is accomplished. Papa Bear out.
